value: This page describes Aylmer (Ontario), for Aylmer (Qu√©bec) see

Thousands of Tundra Swans arrive in the spring as they make their way from their wintering grounds on Chesapeake Bay, to the Arctic - where they breed.  They stop over at the Wildlife Management Area near the Ontario Police College on Hacienda Road, located on the north-east side of Aylmer.

A sizable local community of Amish people. They live without electricity and use horse-drawn carriages and buggies.
Definitely try "Peter's Pizza" one of the oldest pizza places in the area.
